item.title: ‘Terrestrial’ Review: An Intervention on a Rising Sci-Fi Author Gives Way to a Clever, Unclassifiable Genre Mashup
item.description: A cheerfully macabre comedy of misunderstandings, lies and delusion, “Terrestrial” teases with the promise of science-fiction — but it turns out the kind of fantasy at work here is less about outer sp
